tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_processing_activity (
    activity_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_consent(user_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (activity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_consent (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  consent_description TEXT,
  consent_given_at TIMESTAMP,
  consent_valid_until TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE data_processing_activity (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_description TEXT,
  activity_type TEXT,
  activity_start_time TIMESTAMP,
  activity_end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  data_content JSONB,
  data_collection_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_consent_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_personal_data(user_id),
    activity_id INT REFERENCES data_processing_activities(activity_id),
    consent_status BOOL NOT NULL,
    consent_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
